amendment.description: To waive certain matching requirements for counties and parishes in which the President declared a major disaster in response to Hurricane Katrina of 2005 or Hurricane Rita of 2005.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3223 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3223 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S12741-12742; text: CR S12741) To waive certain matching requirements for counties and parishes in which the President declared a major disaster in response to Hurricane Katrina of 2005 or Hurricane Rita of 2005.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3223 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3223 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
